commit message: IME: Do not disable the microphone button

IME: Update GUI in onReadyForSpeech

It was updated only in onBeginningOfSpeech which is too late and thus confusing.
Use fragments in the preferences menu

IME settings: add multi service/language setting

This merges the separate services and languages settings, removes
'system default' and allows multiple combinations to be selected.

Merge pull request #36 from Kaljurand/multilang

Use multiple service-language combinations on the speech keyboard
